title: Calvin Harris Responds to Happy Ending Rumors, Threatens Lawsuits for Defamation
text:
Calvin Harris Responds to Happy Ending Rumors, Threatens Lawsuits for Defamation 
Published By: JustJared.com - Today 
Calvin Harris is responding to rumors that he got a “happy ending” at a Thai massage parlor and he is threatening to sue for defamation ...
